subject: PLM issue fix: 1. Cause:Force close due to concurrent access to a singleton instance. Res:now safe guarding it by that code using mitex. 2. Cause:Exposure button was unclickable as it's display rect was small. Res:increased it display rect
commitMessage:
PLM issue fix: 1. Cause:Force close due to concurrent access to a singleton instance. Res:now safe guarding it by that code using mitex. 2. Cause:Exposure button was unclickable as it's display rect was small. Res:increased it display rect

Change-Id: I19978c52e30ed4d3fbc397197ebfea7273206bcd
Signed-off-by: Rakesh Gajjar <rakesh.2206@samsung.com>
